attributes.action: Officially ban the burka hospitals, schools, courts and airports.
attributes.additional_details:
We the people call on the government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland to ban the burka in hospitals, schools, courts and airports. The burka is factually a cultural phenomenon that is un-subjectively in the koran.

It is in the best interest of the public to ban the burka in hospitals, schools, courts and airports.
